[vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”bottom” fade_in_opacity=”pix-opacity-2″ pix_over_visibility=”” bottom_divider_select=”9″ responsive_css=”{“pix_res_sm_mt“:“-120px“}” css=”.vc_custom_1646904375299{margin-bottom: -55px !important;padding-top: 175px !important;background-color: #2f529e !important;}” fade_in_intro=”20″ b_custom_height=”50px”][vc_row pix_particles_check=””][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1589595508057{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;}”]

100% Assured Job Program in Digital Marketing

[vc_empty_space height=”10px”]

Courses Designed to Ensure 360° Development of Industry Freshers. This program include employability enhancement and mandatory apprenticeship leading to your First Job

[vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

 Assured Job* | Starting Salary- Min. 15K*

 

 Scholarship Scheme also Available

 

  Eligibility Criteria: 10+2 (In Any-Stream)

 

 Easy-Installment & Loan Facility Available

 

 In-Course Internships in Partner Companies

 

  Placement support till you get the job*

 

  Special Guidance in Completing Graduation

[/vc_column_text]

GET BROCHURE
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”34599″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1658393212424{margin-bottom: -1px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” pix_over_visibility=”” css=”.vc_custom_1646912673101{padding-top: 120px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” pix_particles_check=””][vc_column]
Bringing the Best of Hybrid Learning to you
Hybrid Learning = Collaborative Classroom + DOLMS
[vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1646308277647{padding-top: 60px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Track your learning progress & achievements with SMART tracker

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

[vc_empty_space height=”25px”][vc_column_text]

Content Library

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1646902656031{margin-top: -20px !important;}”]

Access 100+ PPTs and videos, updated regularly on DOLMS

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

[vc_empty_space height=”25px”][vc_column_text]

Surprise Tasks

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1646902590004{margin-top: -20px !important;}”]

Surprise live tasks & projects for real industry exposure

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row pix_particles_check=””][vc_column][vc_column_text]

DigiHero is the Best Course after 12th for Commerce

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” pix_over_visibility=”” css=”.vc_custom_1646984044416{margin-top: 80px !important;padding-top: 70px !important;background-color: #2a50a3 !important;}”][vc_row pix_particles_check=”” css=”.vc_custom_1649755617705{margin-bottom: -100px !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1589595508057{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;}”]

Providing Central and Zonal Placement Activities

[vc_empty_space height=”10px”]

Our placement cell is divided into Head Office and Zonal Teams to ensure we are able to find and offer region-wise Job and Internship opportunities for candidates.

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content” pix_particles_check=””][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1649755663538{margin-bottom: -35px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”34723″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1658393279439{margin-top: -30px !important;}”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]
[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1646909667058{margin-top: 15px !important;}”]

In-Course Internships

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1646909693416{margin-top: 15px !important;}”]

Resume Building

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1646909713674{margin-top: 15px !important;}”]

Campus Drives

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1646909732651{margin-top: 15px !important;}”]

Mock Interviews

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1646909837373{margin-top: 15px !important;}”]

LMS Jobs

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1646909804827{margin-top: 15px !important;}”]

Interview Communication

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” pix_over_visibility=”” responsive_css=”{“pix_res_sm_mt“:“100px“}” css=”.vc_custom_1646984081570{margin-bottom: 30px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_row pix_particles_check=”” responsive_css=”{“pix_res_sm_mt“:“-160px“}” css=”.vc_custom_1646984355019{margin-top: 70px !important;}”][vc_column]

Learn From Industry’s Leading Content And Certified Faculty
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” pix_particles_check=”” css=”.vc_custom_1646309024297{margin-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1646906065114{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_text]Digiperform’s Content Consultation & Development team has members from Executive Level to CEO’s & Founders . The idea behind having such a wide hierarchy was to ensure that our content can offer students the exact
knowledge required at each level.

This content is further delivered by our certified trainers who have practically implemented Digital Marketing in their careers and have also gone through an extensive Digiperform Trainer Certication Program to maximise the program learning outcome.

Recognises the Best Performing Students & Faculty, Across the digiperform network and is aimed at achieving excellence via internal competition.[/vc_column_text]

START WITH FREE DEMO
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”16px”][vc_single_image image=”34694″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” pix_over_visibility=”1″ css=”.vc_custom_1646985590113{padding-top: 10px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_row content_placement=”middle” pix_over_visibility=”2″ bottom_divider_select=”8″ b_has_animation=”true” b_2_is_gradient=”true” b_2_color=”#ff6c5f” b_2_color_2=”#3292f2″ b_2_animation=”fade-in-up” b_3_is_gradient=”true” b_3_color=”rgba(255,255,255,0.1)” b_3_color_2=”rgba(255,255,255,0.01)” b_3_animation=”fade-in-up” pix_particles_check=”” css=”.vc_custom_1645518140018{padding-bottom: 120px !important;background-color: #2a50a3 !important;border-radius: 10px !important;}” b_2_delay=”200″ b_3_delay=”300″][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1590117583962{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-right: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;padding-left: 40px !important;}” offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-1 vc_col-lg-5″]
Theory, Live Practical & Implementation
Award Winning LMS – DOLMS!

High-quality explainer videos of all topics. Learn on desktop or mobile-based on preferences
also you can track your learning progress with SMART tracker.

WATCH THE VIDEO [/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1590022821749{padding-top: 40px !important;}”]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” pix_over_visibility=”” top_divider_select=”19″ css=”.vc_custom_1646985533581{padding-top: 70px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;}”][vc_row pix_particles_check=””][vc_column]
What Our Trainees Have To Say

Our Courses have Been Receiving an average rating of 9.4/10 from our course participants. Till date, Digiperform has trained more than 30,000+ individuals.

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content” content_placement=”middle” pix_particles_check=”” pix_visibility=”1″ css=”.vc_custom_1600636409677{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;}”][vc_column]

Best institute for digital marketing. I suggest all my friends about Digiperform. They provide depth course module both technically and strategically. Happy to be a part of Digiperform.

Harsh Rawat

If you are looking for an institute which helps you learn digital marketing, then you must consider Digiperform. They are the best in this field.

Kimz Hnamte

Great learning experience at Digiperform. We were provided with theoretical along with practical exposure. I enjoyed studying and developed a new skills.

Arushi Sharma

My personal experience with Digiperform was good, especially when it comes to PPC the trainer here have the depth of knowledge over the subject line.

Suyash Chitre
[/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” pix_over_visibility=”” css=”.vc_custom_1645530678170{border-top-width: 1px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;border-top-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.08) !important;border-top-style: solid !important;}”][vc_row pix_particles_check=”” css=”.vc_custom_1645532237546{padding-bottom: 20px !important;}” el_id=”hiring”][vc_column]
Corporates Clients Hiring Digiperformers Include

Moreover, 13,300+ Fresher Got their 1st Job; With Digiperform Certifications & Over 9000+ Trainees Got Better Salary Hike.

[vc_empty_space][vc_single_image image=”33470″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” pix_over_visibility=”” top_divider_select=”19″ top_layers=”1″ css=”.vc_custom_1590187066813{padding-bottom: 80px !important;}” el_id=”pix_section_contact”][vc_row pix_particles_check=”” el_id=”contact”][vc_column]
